Headline: #88 Higgins Temporary Reroute at Higgins/Mango
ShortDescription: 88 Higgins buses are temporarily rerouted via Higgins, Central, Lawrence, Austin and Higgins, due to street blockage near Higgins/Mango.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#88 Higgins buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Higgins, Central, Lawrence, Austin and Higgins, due to street blockage near Higgins/Mango.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #31 31st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 35th/Shields
ShortDescription: WB 31 31st buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Wallace and 31st, due to street blockage near 35th/Shields.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #31 31st buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Wallace and 31st, due to street blockage near 35th/Shields.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
